attributes.action: Ensure that any individual that is convicted of 'murder' and / or 'causing or allowing the death of a child or vunerable person' is not provided with a new identify prior to or upon release from prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As our government, you are asked to represent the views of the people of this country. 

I believe, that the majority of the UK population do not support measures that 'protect' any individual (who has been convicted of this type of crime) upon release from prison. 

If this is 'in conflict' with the 'human rights act', then perhpas we should review the content of this 'policy' also. Afterall, why should any person that has murdered or 'allowed' the murder of another human (particularly a small child), have any 'human rights'.

Any change in policy or law should be allowed to be applied restrospectively.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
